about_the_game:
For Solium Infernum we knew only our long time collaborator, Michael Allen, could conjure a soundscape worthy of Milton's vision of the Infernal Pit and Vic Davis' grand design. Somewhere between dark choral requiems and electronic synth sinewaves, you'll find the forlorn sonic vistas of Solium Infernum... a genre Michael has dubbed, "Moog Requiem."

Original Music by Michael Allen
Produced, Mixed and Mastered by Michael Allen
Cover Art by Ty Carey

Featuring the single 'Eternal Nights' by Sarah Wolfe, Xavier Dunn & Michael Allen
Produced, Mixed and Mastered by Xavier Dunn

Michael Allen has gone from chart-surfing pop songs to moving soundtracks, having composed for award winning videogames The Forgotten City and Armello, among many others.

Multidisciplinary artist and creator Sarah Wolfe is testing the limits of pop sensibilities, having been featured in Rolling Stone and honoured in NME's Global 100 Emerging Artist's for 2023. Her single Eternal Nights is a collaboration between Michael Allen, Xavier Dunn and herself.

Solium Infernum (Original Game Soundtrack) Total Length: 1:02:13
